{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=libfund_ts_2|
constexpr observer_ptr() noexcept;
constexpr observer_ptr( nullptr_t ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=libfund_ts_2|
constexpr explicit observer_ptr( element_type* p ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl|num=3|since=libfund_ts_2|
template&lt; class W2 &gt;
constexpr observer_ptr( observer_ptr&lt;W2&gt; other ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl|num=4|since=libfund_ts_2|notes={{mark implicit}}|1= 
observer_ptr( const observer_ptr&amp; other ) = default;
}}
{{dcl|num=5|since=libfund_ts_2|notes={{mark implicit}}|1= 
observer_ptr( observer_ptr&amp;&amp; other ) = default;
}}

@1@ Constructs an {{tt|observer_ptr}} that has no corresponding watched object.
@2@ Constructs an {{tt|observer_ptr}} that watches {{c|p}}.
@3@ Constructs an {{tt|observer_ptr}} that watches {{c|other.get()}}. {{cpp/enable_if|{{c|W2*}} is convertible to {{c|element_type*}}}}.
@4,5@ Implicitly declared copy and move constructors. Constructs an {{tt|observer_ptr}} that watches {{c|other.get()}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|p|a pointer to an object to watch}}
{{par|other|another {{tt|observer_ptr}} to copy from}}
{{par end}}
